title: LFT Plat 3+ Active Mid
body:
Sodium Rising (G3Promos) looking for a serious mid laner with 2nd role preferably as top. 
We are a semi serious team and play to climb.
Will be hitting plat in off season and going diamond in Season 6.
Bot lane - D5 Adc (in high ranking 5s teams also)
               - D5 Sup/top (will play sup due to good synergy with adc)
Jungle    - Me Plat 4 (Normally shot calls due to map knowledge of whats going on)
Top        - Plat 5 (experienced in diamonds teams s5 can also support)
Mid        - Gold 2/Gold 1 (both good players but not available as much)

MUST HAVE GOOD COMMUNICATION WITH THE TEAM.   Communication = Win.  Win = Climb  Climb = Happy.

replies.body: Message me when u get on im looking for a team now that i have my new computer
